page.title: 03 HOUSES.
page.content: Most of the {houses}in {Funtington} are {brick built}with {tiled}roofs.One house was{timber_framed.}We were surprised to find little use of flint as a building material. Many of the houses are{modern,} built within the last forty years.One pair of semi_detached houses were being built when we made our survey. Apart from the many{detached}houses in the village, we also saw six{ {semi_detached,}one row of three{ {terraced}houses,a lodge,a restaurant but no flats. We think Funtington village might be a retirement area.It would appear to be quite a wealthy area because most of the houses are privately owned,detached properties with large,secluded gardens.One even had its own tennis court!
